text.div:
GeneticCoordinateSystem

Base coordinate systems start and end measurements for variants

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/genomics-reporting/CodeSystem/genetic-coordinate-system defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
Interval Interval0-based numbering or interbase coordinate system, inclusive start, exclusive end
Variant method Variant method1 for 1-based numbering or base coordinate system, inclusive start, inclusive end
Alignment method Alignment method1-based [inclusive start, inclusive end] - with Variant Method (HGVS-like)

name: GeneticCoordinateSystem
description: Base coordinate systems start and end measurements for variants

concept.definition: 0-based numbering or interbase coordinate system, inclusive start, exclusive end
1 for 1-based numbering or base coordinate system, inclusive start, inclusive end
1-based [inclusive start, inclusive end] - with Variant Method (HGVS-like)
